content.title: Easy and simple Gameplay (suitable for kids), vibrant and captivating graphics
paragraphs: Learning tables is not going to be a boring process for your kids now that Multiplication Table Kids 10x10 is available on PlayStore. Multiplication Table Kids 10x10 is the best app out there if you want to make your little ones learn the tables up to 10 in a fun and interesting way. Kids, in this modern world, are more interested to use tech gadgets in place of reading books. You can download this app on their cell phone or tablet and make table learning a fun process for them.

Multiplication Table Kids 10x10 works like a quiz. The first step is to select the table, a question will appear on the screen along with four options. On tapping the correct option, few points will be added to the player’s score tally. On the other hand, tapping the wrong answer will cost the player a life. The players will have to tap an option in limited time period. Failing to do so will also cost them a life. However, the option of “more time” can come to their rescue. Availing this option will give them more time to complete the quiz. The game begins with training levels. Upon the completion of training levels, kids can enjoy various interesting, exciting, and challenging levels. The game boasts of various other fun features and achievements for kids i.e. bonus rewards, high score of the day, top of the week, month, year, and century player.

• Vibrant and captivating graphics
  • Enthralling background score
  • Easy and simple Gameplay (suitable for kids)
Multiplication Table Kids 10x10 now in your little one’s gadget and help them to learn tables in a fun and exciting way.
